Author: Althbird
Text: Exactly!! I’m so glad someone else gets it!! Makes me feel a lot less crazy.   Thank you 🙏

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: God I hated so much at all the residential places when the techs would just be like, “use your coping skills!” in what felt like an obnoxious sing song voice. K thx, cuz yeah, the problem was totally that holding ice and doing square breathing just hadn’t occurred to me!....not that I was in a level of emotional distress that overwhelmed me and I was reaching out for compassion and human contact.   Fwiw, I’m sorry you’re hurting.
